alert.note: Alert for Eastern Hampden; Northern Worcester; Southern Worcester (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 23 at 3:51PM EDT by NWS Boston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Windham, northern Tolland, northeastern Hartford, southwestern Worcester and southeastern Hampden Counties through 445 PM EDT... At 351 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Stafford, or 8 miles east of Enfield, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Strong winds could cause minor damage such as downed branches. Little to no impact from hail is expected. Locations impacted include... Enfield, Vernon, Southbridge, East Longmeadow, Ellington, Tolland, Charlton, Palmer, Stafford, Somers, Dudley, East Windsor, Thompson, Sturbridge, Monson, Woodstock, Willington, Hampden, Warren and Ashford. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Get indoors when you hear thunder. Do not resume outdoor activities until at least 30 minutes after the storm has passed. Do not drive through flooded roads or underpasses. Avoid low lying areas near small streams.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Hampden; Northern Worcester; Southern Worcester
